alert.note: Alert for Colquitt (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 30 at 10:08AM EST until November 30 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 AM EST FOR COOK...SOUTHEASTERN GRADY...SOUTHEASTERN BERRIEN...LANIER... LOWNDES...SOUTHERN THOMAS...BROOKS AND SOUTHEASTERN COLQUITT COUNTIES... At 1008 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sparks to 9 miles east of Pavo to 9 miles south of Thomasville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Nashville, Adel, Valdosta, Lake Park, Lakeland, Quitman, Thomasville, Moultrie, Hahira, Sparks, Boston, Ray City, Pavo, I-75 At Exit 16, Moody Air Force Base, Remerton, Meigs, Dasher, Morven and Berlin. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon EST for Big Bend of Florida...and south central and southwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
